usage.cn: 您看过我公司的短重索赔报告了吗？
usage.eng: Have you seen the shortage claim from our company?

usage.cn: 公司有时在出差费用上非常小气。
usage.eng: The company is sometimes very cheap with the travel expenses.

usage.cn: 最好的朋友是那种在你难过时，默默地陪着你，什么也不用说的人，而当他离开时，你却会怀念和他一起的时光。
usage.eng: The best friend is the silent company when you are sad and the reminder of your time together when you are apart..

usage.cn: 科技优势顶多给予一个公司6~12个月的领先优势，然而商业模式的优势会持续多年，并产生领域独占性。 ——Robert L. Bailey
usage.eng: Technological Innovation gives a company a 6-12 month advantage, at most. A Business Model advantage can last years potentially yielding a dominant franchise.
